summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 6.230, the Seattle Steam Engineers and Boiler Firemen Code, amending Sections 6.230.030, 6.230.040, 6.230.060, 6.230.070, 6.230.140 and 6.230.160, adding and amending definitions, amending the scope of licenses, amending the requirements for observation and inspection of boilers, and adding a new Section 6.230.045 adding a requirement for periodic refresher training for licensed steam engineers and boiler firemen.
